turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From Starbucks in Roswell, New Mexico.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a cherry mocha grande with soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please, and I'd actually like an extra shot of espresso in it, too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, just to let you know, starbucks will charge extra for the extra shot of espresso, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, which location in roswell would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know am not really sure cuz I'm kind of visiting out of town.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i can check for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: are you close to the location on main street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that one worked good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i'll send your order to that starbucks, please wait one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a grande cherry mocha with soy milk and whipped cream and an extra shot of espresso to be picked up at the starbucks on 1309 north main street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Great, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you, can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
